name: Reckpunk
description: Reckpunk is a platformer/endless runner where you control level elements rather than the main characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or better Processor: 1.8 Ghz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic card with 128 Mo RAM compatible with OpenGL 1.5 (Intel GMA 3100 g31/33 not supported) Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
